title: Exploring the impact of agricultural digitalization on smallholder farmers' livelihoods in Ghana
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Monica Addison, Isaac Bonuedi, Albert Abraham Arhin, Bernice Wadei, Ebenezer Owusu-Addo, Ernestina Fredua Antoh, Nathaniel Mensah-Odum
